title: He’s Super Sticky - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Apathetic Protagonist   Apocalypse   Clingy Lover   Cold Protagonist   Cross-dressing   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Love at First Sight   Modern Day   Mysterious Past   Older Love Interests   Omegaverse   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Showbiz   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transmigration   Unconditional Love   Vampires   World Hopping   Zombies
author: Ying Zhi   瀛之
description:
“Presenting your soul power, I fulfilled the wish in your heart!” Because of the instability of the soul, Bai Chen travels through the various small worlds with the systems, fulfilling one’s soul. It’s just that in every small world there is always a man who makes him fall in love at first sight.

Bai Chen: “Can you kiss and hug me?”

Man: “Baby, come here!”>
